msbt.message: Bon voyage! That's French for congrats on your home renovation! Now that you've got a little more space, here's something to fill it with. Invite me over soon!
Yo, your humble home just got a bit less humble, eh? No need to be modest around me! Here's a small swag delivery for the new space. Hope you like it!
Mega congratulations on mega- sizing your pad! Be sure to set aside some time to enjoy this gift when you're not busy cleaning your huge house. Ha HA!
Yo. I'm in awe of your casa grande! That's Spanish for ginormous mansion. I know you've worked hard for your success, so here's something easy—a gift from me!
